00013 typedef struct

00016   uint8_t tail;
00017   uint8_t free;
00018   uint8_t size;

00020   uint8_t buffer[];
00021 } queue;
00022 
00023 // if the queue does not hold a specific type of objects the general element type can be used to point to any type
00024 typedef struct
00025 {
00026   void* object;
00027   uint8_t size;
00028 } queue_element;

00030 #define Queue_CalculateSize(elementSize, elementCount) (sizeof(queue) + ((elementSize) * (elementCount)))
